name: What The Firkin?
description: Why WTF? Exists To empower creators with fair, transparent launches To give communities real ways to support and discover projects To create a sustainable, revenue-backed rewards ecosystem - without inflation How it works? What The Firkin platform utilises attention, community and liquidity through daily auctions enabling the opportunity for a daily token launch using Clanker protocol Our aim is to be the defacto token launcher on base
